title: Titanic Sinks in the Atlantic
summary: In the early hours of April 15, 1912, the RMS Titanic sank in the North Atlantic after striking an iceberg on her maiden voyage from Southampton to New York. Over 1,500 of the 2,224 passengers and crew perished, making it one of the deadliest peacetime maritime disasters in history. The tragedy led to sweeping reforms in maritime safety regulations worldwide.
